title: Such buildings shall be equipped with a manually-operated electrical fire alarm system with one or more call boxes located at each floor
clause_text: Such buildings shall be equipped with a manually-operated electrical fire alarm system with one or more call boxes located at each floor. The call boxes shall be so located that one or other of them shall be accessible to all occupants of the floor without having to travel more than 30 m.
section: Special buildings above 15 m. in height and Business and Industrial buildings above 32 m in height-
